hibernate-mapping.sql-query: DELETE FROM EO_DIVIDE_MILESTONE EODM WHERE EODM.EODM_EODR_SEQUENCE IN (SELECT EODR.EODR_SEQUENCE FROM eo_divide_procedure EODR WHERE EODR.EODR_ID IN (:ids)) and EODM.EODM_WORK_TYPE_CODE in (SELECT EODR.EODR_WORK_TYPE_CODE FROM eo_divide_procedure EODR WHERE EODR.EODR_ID IN (:ids)) and EODM.ORG_ID = :orgId
